emptySearch.advancedGuide: For advanced usecases see official documentation
emptySearch.chatbotGuide: On the right-hand top corner, there is a button titled “Chatbot.” The Chatbot functionality allows you to ask the chatbot a question and get an answer back using the queried files on the left. When you enter a search term into the top search bar, Loom returns the most relevant files. When you click the Chatbot button and ask the Chatbot a question in the side menu’s bottom chatbot bar, the chatbot uses those queried, relevant files to answer your question. To start, click the Chatbot button in the top right, and, when the right-hand side menu for the chatbot pops out, type your relevant question in the bottom search bar.
emptySearch.description: Just type your query in search input above and hit Enter

tips.title: Try these tips to refine your search
tips.prefix: search for all strings starting with "Jo"
tips.exactDistance: search for both "John" and "Smith" words with maximum distance of 10 words
tips.fuzzy: fuzzy search for word "John" in all files with maximum of 2 replacements
tips.size: search for all files larger than 1 Megabyte (options: "M" for Megabytes, "K" for Kilobytes)
tips.when: search for all files modified today (options: today, yesterday, thisweek, thismonth, thisyear)
tips.author: search for all files where author field exists
tips.tagsNegate: search for files NOT tagged with "interesting"
tips.and: search for all files tagged with "interesting" and have a timestamp from today
tips.or: search for all files tagged with "interesting" or have a timestamp from today

sort.title: Or sort your files
sort.name: sort all files by name in A-Z order
sort.uploaded: sort to show most recently uploaded files first
